trans-unit.source: A factory class for creating <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> objects from Windows NT aliases, e-mail addresses, and security identifiers (SIDs).
trans-unit.target: Uma classe de fábrica para criar <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> objetos aliases do Windows NT, endereços de email e identificadores de segurança (SIDs).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All methods in ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory are static and no instance needs to be created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Todos os métodos no ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory são estáticos e nenhuma instância deve ser criada.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is hidden.
trans-unit.target: O construtor está oculto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"></xref> object that is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"> </xref> objeto que está associado com o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> object is used for changing the standard Active Directory schema properties that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> class uses.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration>objeto é usado para alterar as propriedades de esquema padrão do Active Directory que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>classe usa.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"> </xref> objeto associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> using the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> usando o alias especificado do Windows NT.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>é uma implementação concreta do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>classe abstrata que é usada para acessar a funcionalidade do Active Directory.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o repositório do Active Directory é usado para armazenar informações organizacionais para a equipe.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: O objetivo principal para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>é para fazer consultas em tais informações organizacionais, por motivos comerciais.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: The alias string to create the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres do alias para criar o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that describes the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que descreve o alias especificado do Windows NT.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> using an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> usando um endereço de email.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>é uma implementação concreta do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>classe abstrata que é usada para acessar a funcionalidade do Active Directory.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o repositório do Active Directory é usado para armazenar informações organizacionais para a equipe.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: O objetivo principal para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>é para fazer consultas em tais informações organizacionais, por motivos comerciais.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address string from which to create the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de endereço de email do qual criar o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that describes the specified e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que descreve o endereço de email especificado.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> using a Windows NT <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> usando o Windows NT <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>é uma implementação concreta do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>classe abstrata que é usada para acessar a funcionalidade do Active Directory.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o repositório do Active Directory é usado para armazenar informações organizacionais para a equipe.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: O objetivo principal para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>é para fazer consultas em tais informações organizacionais, por motivos comerciais.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> to use to create the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> usar para criar o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that describes the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que descreve especificado <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>.
